prompt: Create a clean account verification page with a light grey background and a professional corporate design. Display a centered blue shield icon at the top, followed by a title 'Secure Account Verification' in dark blue. Include a descriptive text in grey below, explaining the 4-digit code process. Arrange four square input fields with subtle blue borders in a horizontal row, each field centered and limited to one digit. Add a dark blue 'Verify' button with sharp corners below the fields, and a 'Resend Code' text link in blue at the bottom center. Use a Column layout with balanced spacing and padding, emphasizing a professional, trustworthy aesthetic with clean lines and minimal decoration.
